TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Chile, title = Chile, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chile} }

S.FORM: Chile hya' ga cyux maki' tay 30 00 S, 71 00 W na Nan-Meco syuw. kwara' kinghciyan niya' 756,102 sq km (maki' tay 38ginkgan kin wahci') (kinwhci' niya' ga 743,812 sq km , kinwhci' na lawsayan wsilung hya' ga 12,290 sq km) Kinkhmayan kwara' squliq hya' ga 17,650,114. Pinbcyan naha' sni' naha' rhzyal hya' iy pqmahun hya' ga 21.10% , lhlahuy hya' ga 21.90%, sni' naha' sa pptzyuwaw sa bzinah hya' ga 57%. gwahan zyuwaw na ppila經濟 maki squ 2010 kawas,kwara ka ssquliq nyux mtywaw squ Kooka na Chile qani ga wayal squ 7,580,000 kwara.kawas nqu 2005 ga , 13.2％qani ga wiway kahul squ rngu mtyuwaw squ slaq , 23％hya ga mtyuwaw kung ye ru 63.9％ hya ga ttun naha mtyuwaw. 2013kawas skahun squ lalu musa lmpuw pinhtgan naha mtyuwaw qu qeqaya ga kya wayal squ kahul zik nqu Kokka na ssquliq pinhtgan naha mtywaw wal squ 2,857.03 ok pila nqu Amirika , obih mtnaq ki wayan rima phgci squ Kokka hya la. nanu taqu thyayan naha mbazi ga tntnaq GDP ga wayal hminas squ 20,000 pila na Amirik kinhlagan nqu pqmahan na ga blaq balay spyang naha muhi ga ringgo ru sgnaw ru qitun qinuw tumaw mugi meluh na qinuw bolu qani qu nyux naha pmhyun, cingay balay qu kinbalay naha qu qwaw na sgnaw, maki squ2006 kawas Kokka nqu Chile ga 4,442,877 tun qu kinnyat naha qulih. spyang ggwah pila nqu Kokka nqu Chile ga yuwaw nqu skitang , maki squ 1991kawas , pinposa qeqaya nqu Chile ga 48% hya ga wiway qeqaya na kwang . maki squ cinbwanan qani ga spyang krahu qu kblayan phtuw tong kwang ga Kokka nqu Chile qani tong qani qu paras ppila squ Chile.myan nqu 埃斯孔迪達(Escondida),phtuw kbalay kwara squ cibwanan ga 8% qu kahun squ btunux na kwang kbalay tong. Chile qani ga maki yal nqu 南美洲kwra ka spyang wagiq Kokka ziyuw gwahan na ppila ka linpgan ga (pbkgun squ kwara ka Kokka gq maki te mpiytu) llpgan nqu ini phmut ru ini qaniq pila ,knita kwara ka cibwanan nqu gingkuw ga wagiq qu lmwan naha ppila, spwah squ ruma na pinspngan (yan nqu pinlpgan naha squ squliq) baqun maha wayal rima mhgci qu Kokka naha la 2010 kawas , Chile qani ga maki squ 南美洲te qutux na OECDmaki lahuy na Kokka. Ana maha maki squ 拉美 hiya qu spyang cimyuwaw na Kokka , maki qu ini ptnaq qu kincimuyuwaw nya spyang nqu mzyuwaw,maki squ syakay naha mita squ phyup qani ru gaga nqu mtyuwaw ki pila qqayat nqu bbnkis pinbkuw naha gaga qani ga maki qu hngyang maha aki yugun ma .taqu biru s'yuw squ pila thki na Chile ga nanu m'pila nqu Chile. rrhyal地理 mkura kilux ki mkura tltu kintwahiq maki squ rhyal nqu Chile ga wayal squ 4300kung ri, maki squ rgyax na安第斯 ki baybih bsilung , taqu ht'gan wagi ki tekyopan wagi kintwahiq naha hya ga nanak 200 kung ri( spyang kinglabang nya ga wayal squ 400kung ri ) , squn qani mita qu rhyal na Kokka ga rgzin balay , obih yan nqu qutux qruyux rgzin na rhyal Kokka maki sa kwaraka babaw cinbwanan nanu yasa qu maki qutux sinlluwan lalu na Chile maha "Kokka na patay". kwara ka rhyal nqu Chile qani mosa cyugal qu qinsugal : cingay qu rrhyax maki sa mkura tltu, cingay qu wagiq na b'bu rgyax wayal hminas sa 6000 mi. maki squ rgyax na安第斯sazing qu rgyax te kska naha ga bbnaqi阿他加馬 maki babaw rhyal qani ga spyang mtkyay qu rhyal qani , yalaw gi nyux 'mukan na副熱帶高壓, qutux qutux cinsuqan kawas ga ungat qu qalax nya.s'wayal ga min kbalay squ 硝酸kwang ru pposa tbziran, misuw qani lga spyang kbalay squ tong kwang. taqu rhyal qani spyang krahu na kinkina naha hya ga 安托法加斯塔(219,000 ssquliq ka nyux maki sqani)ki伊基, kayal nqu te k'ska hya ga myal nqu kayal na kska bsilung. kayal nqu rhyal te k'ska hya ga msyam balay ,cingay balay qu squliq nya . spyang nqu ki'an naha ka qalang ga 聖地牙哥(kya wayal squ 650squliq nya )anu nyux maki squani.iyat nanak qani maki uzi qu瓦爾帕萊索(gwahan ru hngawan nqu qasu,280,000 squliq nyux maki sqani)ki康塞普西翁(pslyan kska zyuwaw nqu mtyuwaw ki tmslaq,350,000 squliq nyux maki sqani)hminas spyang na ki'an sinkina. te mkura kilux hya ga cikuy cikay qu squliq nya, qlwaxan iyan , krahu qu behuy ru lwakah msbisuw . tegling kintan nqu bsilung ga cingay qu 島嶼ki峽灣 krahu nqu rhyal kura squ mkura kilux hya ga maki qu火地島 Chile ki 阿根廷pinsmka naha, te gleng na火地島 ga maki qutux 島 babaw na 島 qani ga 合恩角squn naha qani hya ga spyang mkura kilux Chile ki 南美洲. rhyal nqu mkura tltu puqing qsya ki puqing qsya te mkura kilux, iyat nanak spyang blaq qu rahyl kahul squ mtlaka sinqunan na tlak m'krahu qu qutux na rhyal . taring squ tekyopan wagi msa ht'gan wagi minaring hga qutux nqu rgzin na kinta'n bslung , ru m'rgyax la , babaw lga wayal wagiq glabang qu rhyal la. maki squ rhyal na kska qani hya ga msyam balay qu wagi rhyal nya, baqun tmbul ru qmayat squ qqyatan. Chile ki玻利維亞ru saysaw na 阿根廷hya ga rgyax na 安第斯 mkura turu ryax nqu ht'gan wagi. iyat nanak qni kska na Taypinyang 胡安·費爾南德斯群島ki復活節島naha naqi ga rhyal na Chile uzi. pspngun qutux qutux kawas qu qinlwaxan nya maki squ Chile mkura tltu na安托法加斯塔 ga wal squ 12.7 haw mi,maki 聖地牙哥hya ga wayl squ 375haw mi,maki squ mkura kilux rhyal nqu火地島hya ga wayal squ 5800haw mi. ssquliq nya人口 maki squ 2012 kawas gmuywaw hmkang maqut ssquilq na Chile ga 16,341,929 kwara qu squliq naha .yalawgi 1990 kawqs naha qasa ga pinlqyan naha laqi ga wayal mbyaq , squliq na Chile ga wal si 'byaq , rima naha lpgun 2050 kawas mwasa tehuk squ 2,020 mang , ru mmosa mhtuw squ ptwang squliq . Kokka na Chile hya ga cinga qu minrok naha , wiwan maha squliq na Kokka naha ga kahul squ cingay nqu ini ptnaq kinbahan Kokka ru squliq na 印第安,kwara ka squlq 'nimaw naha squ ini ptnaq na Kokka.maki squ Chile,59％ na squliq naha maha sami hya ga kibahan sami nqu pelquwi na 歐洲,25％ nqu suliq hya ga kmal maha sami ga squliq na 麥士蒂索 ma(kinbahan nqu squliq na pelquwi歐洲ki squliq na印第安 mbbiq laqi kneril lga yasa qu immaw qu ramu naha la) ,thay nya lga kinbahan nqu squliq ka mqalux非洲,squliq na 印第安ru binah na minrok la .squliq ka pelquwi nqu Chile spyang kahul squ kinbahan kinhang an西班牙(pyang squliq na西班牙,安達盧西亞ki squliq na巴斯克),maki uzi qu kahul squ ka kwara kahul binah na Kokka mwah maki te智利qani,maki uzi qu kahul squ minrok na 歐洲zik qani ga wayal mimaw ramu ki kahul squ中東te huk squ Chile squliq kinbahan na阿拉伯.Squliq Kinbahan nqu 非洲hya ga si kyasa cikuy,kya wayl squ squ 1.5% qu squliq na Chile.Piraiyan na kawas,Kokka nqu Chile swalan nya qu kahul squ pelquwi ,日本,台灣,韓國squliq ka tnwang.skahu squ 2011 kawas gmuzywaw maqut squ ssquliq,squliq nqu Chile kyawayal squ 8％ kmayal maha sami hya ga ''tayal sqani ma. 70%na ssquliq ga snhi squ Teskyo,15% ssquliq ga snihi squ 新教,3.3% ssquliq ga snihi squ摩門教,1% ssquliq ga snihi squ耶和華見證人,8.3% ssquliq ga ini snihi. Chileqani ga baq kmal ke na西班牙(ana ga ke na 西班牙maki sqani ga yal nqu qutux na mnanak blaq la,yal nqu "Chile"lga lpgun naha lgayal qani la ('ʃiːle)).Ke nqu馬普切,ke na maki squ mkura kilux玻利維亞克丘亞,ke na艾馬拉,ke na 拉帕努伊hya ga ke na ''tayal sqani.maki squ rhyal na mkura kilux Chile qinsugan naha,maki uzi qu kmal ke na德語. pinsrngyan外交 pinglgan na Chile ki 馬來西亞ga kahul squ ggwhan nqu pinbziran.maki squ 2009 kawas,pila ka pintbziran na Chile ki馬來西亞kya wayal squ 3.36 ok pila na Amirika,taqu 馬來西亞pnosa nya pila squ Chile ga wayal squ 1680mang pila nqu Amirika,pila ka mwah myut hya ga wayal squ1.487ok pila na Amirika. gaga文化 gaga nqu Chile ga squnun naha ki tnwang squ cinpuqing nqu歐洲,msqun gaga squliq na印第安,pchup squ innaras na北美,nanu yasa qu gaga na Chile ungat spngan kinblaq gaga nya maki squ babaw cibwanan qani,kruma ga obih yal mtnnnaq ktan. spzyang qalang na Kokka' spzyang naha' krahu' qalang hya' ga Santiago. snyan kinramat inlungan na Kokka' snyan kinramat inlungan na Kokka' hya' ga 18 na tay mqiru' byacing na qutux kawas. mrhuw Kokka' mrhuw Kokka' ta' misuw hya' ga Michelle Bachelet, aring ryax 11 squ byacing tay 3 sa kawas 2014 lga, musa' spazyang balay ms'rux kya la. cinkhulan sa knita' sa brbiru' CIA 外交部

Chile hya' ga cyox maki' tay 30 00 S, 71 00 W na Nan-Meco syow. kwara' kinghciyan niya' 756,102 sq km (maki' tay 38ginkgan kin wahci') (kinwhci' niya' ga 743,812 sq km , kinwhci' na lawsayan wsilong hya' ga 12,290 sq km) Kinkhmayan kwara' sqoliq hya' ga 17,650,114. Pinbcyan naha' sni' naha' rhzyal hya' iy pqmahon hya' ga 21.10% , lhlahoy hya' ga 21.90%, sni' naha' sa pptzyowaw sa bzinah hya' ga 57%. gwahan zyowaw na ppila經濟 maki sqo 2010 kawas,kwara ka ssqoliq nyox mtywaw sqo Kooka na Chile qani ga wayal sqo 7,580,000 kwara.kawas nqo 2005 ga , 13.2％qani ga wiway kahol sqo rngo mtyowaw sqo slaq , 23％hya ga mtyowaw kong ye ro 63.9％ hya ga tton naha mtyowaw. 2013kawas skahon sqo lalo mosa lmpow pinhtgan naha mtyowaw qo qeqaya ga kya wayal sqo kahol zik nqo Kokka na ssqoliq pinhtgan naha mtywaw wal sqo 2,857.03 ok pila nqo Amirika , obih mtnaq ki wayan rima phgci sqo Kokka hya la. nano taqo thyayan naha mbazi ga tntnaq GDP ga wayal hminas sqo 20,000 pila na Amirik kinhlagan nqo pqmahan na ga blaq balay spyang naha mohi ga ringgo ro sgnaw ro qiton qinow tomaw mogi meloh na qinow bolo qani qo nyox naha pmhyon, cingay balay qo kinbalay naha qo qwaw na sgnaw, maki sqo2006 kawas Kokka nqo Chile ga 4,442,877 ton qo kinnyat naha qolih. spyang ggwah pila nqo Kokka nqo Chile ga yowaw nqo skitang , maki sqo 1991kawas , pinposa qeqaya nqo Chile ga 48% hya ga wiway qeqaya na kwang . maki sqo cinbwanan qani ga spyang kraho qo kblayan phtow tong kwang ga Kokka nqo Chile qani tong qani qo paras ppila sqo Chile.myan nqo 埃斯孔迪達(Escondida),phtow kbalay kwara sqo cibwanan ga 8% qo kahon sqo btonox na kwang kbalay tong. Chile qani ga maki yal nqo 南美洲kwra ka spyang wagiq Kokka ziyow gwahan na ppila ka linpgan ga (pbkgon sqo kwara ka Kokka gq maki te mpiyto) llpgan nqo ini phmot ro ini qaniq pila ,knita kwara ka cibwanan nqo gingkow ga wagiq qo lmwan naha ppila, spwah sqo roma na pinspngan (yan nqo pinlpgan naha sqo sqoliq) baqon maha wayal rima mhgci qo Kokka naha la 2010 kawas , Chile qani ga maki sqo 南美洲te qotox na OECDmaki lahoy na Kokka. Ana maha maki sqo 拉美 hiya qo spyang cimyowaw na Kokka , maki qo ini ptnaq qo kincimoyowaw nya spyang nqo mzyowaw,maki sqo syakay naha mita sqo phyop qani ro gaga nqo mtyowaw ki pila qqayat nqo bbnkis pinbkow naha gaga qani ga maki qo hngyang maha aki yogon ma .taqo biro s'yow sqo pila thki na Chile ga nano m'pila nqo Chile. rrhyal地理 mkora kilox ki mkora tlto kintwahiq maki sqo rhyal nqo Chile ga wayal sqo 4300kong ri, maki sqo rgyax na安第斯 ki baybih bsilong , taqo ht'gan wagi ki tekyopan wagi kintwahiq naha hya ga nanak 200 kong ri( spyang kinglabang nya ga wayal sqo 400kong ri ) , sqon qani mita qo rhyal na Kokka ga rgzin balay , obih yan nqo qotox qroyox rgzin na rhyal Kokka maki sa kwaraka babaw cinbwanan nano yasa qo maki qotox sinllowan lalo na Chile maha "Kokka na patay". kwara ka rhyal nqo Chile qani mosa cyogal qo qinsogal : cingay qo rrhyax maki sa mkora tlto, cingay qo wagiq na b'bo rgyax wayal hminas sa 6000 mi. maki sqo rgyax na安第斯sazing qo rgyax te kska naha ga bbnaqi阿他加馬 maki babaw rhyal qani ga spyang mtkyay qo rhyal qani , yalaw gi nyox 'mokan na副熱帶高壓, qotox qotox cinsoqan kawas ga ongat qo qalax nya.s'wayal ga min kbalay sqo 硝酸kwang ro pposa tbziran, misow qani lga spyang kbalay sqo tong kwang. taqo rhyal qani spyang kraho na kinkina naha hya ga 安托法加斯塔(219,000 ssqoliq ka nyox maki sqani)ki伊基, kayal nqo te k'ska hya ga myal nqo kayal na kska bsilong. kayal nqo rhyal te k'ska hya ga msyam balay ,cingay balay qo sqoliq nya . spyang nqo ki'an naha ka qalang ga 聖地牙哥(kya wayal sqo 650sqoliq nya )ano nyox maki sqoani.iyat nanak qani maki ozi qo瓦爾帕萊索(gwahan ro hngawan nqo qaso,280,000 sqoliq nyox maki sqani)ki康塞普西翁(pslyan kska zyowaw nqo mtyowaw ki tmslaq,350,000 sqoliq nyox maki sqani)hminas spyang na ki'an sinkina. te mkora kilox hya ga cikoy cikay qo sqoliq nya, qlwaxan iyan , kraho qo behoy ro lwakah msbisow . tegling kintan nqo bsilong ga cingay qo 島嶼ki峽灣 kraho nqo rhyal kora sqo mkora kilox hya ga maki qo火地島 Chile ki 阿根廷pinsmka naha, te gleng na火地島 ga maki qotox 島 babaw na 島 qani ga 合恩角sqon naha qani hya ga spyang mkora kilox Chile ki 南美洲. rhyal nqo mkora tlto poqing qsya ki poqing qsya te mkora kilox, iyat nanak spyang blaq qo rahyl kahol sqo mtlaka sinqonan na tlak m'kraho qo qotox na rhyal . taring sqo tekyopan wagi msa ht'gan wagi minaring hga qotox nqo rgzin na kinta'n bslong , ro m'rgyax la , babaw lga wayal wagiq glabang qo rhyal la. maki sqo rhyal na kska qani hya ga msyam balay qo wagi rhyal nya, baqon tmbol ro qmayat sqo qqyatan. Chile ki玻利維亞ro saysaw na 阿根廷hya ga rgyax na 安第斯 mkora toro ryax nqo ht'gan wagi. iyat nanak qni kska na Taypinyang 胡安·費爾南德斯群島ki復活節島naha naqi ga rhyal na Chile ozi. pspngon qotox qotox kawas qo qinlwaxan nya maki sqo Chile mkora tlto na安托法加斯塔 ga wal sqo 12.7 haw mi,maki 聖地牙哥hya ga wayl sqo 375haw mi,maki sqo mkora kilox rhyal nqo火地島hya ga wayal sqo 5800haw mi. ssqoliq nya人口 maki sqo 2012 kawas gmoywaw hmkang maqot ssqoilq na Chile ga 16,341,929 kwara qo sqoliq naha .yalawgi 1990 kawqs naha qasa ga pinlqyan naha laqi ga wayal mbyaq , sqoliq na Chile ga wal si 'byaq , rima naha lpgon 2050 kawas mwasa tehok sqo 2,020 mang , ro mmosa mhtow sqo ptwang sqoliq . Kokka na Chile hya ga cinga qo minrok naha , wiwan maha sqoliq na Kokka naha ga kahol sqo cingay nqo ini ptnaq kinbahan Kokka ro sqoliq na 印第安,kwara ka sqolq 'nimaw naha sqo ini ptnaq na Kokka.maki sqo Chile,59％ na sqoliq naha maha sami hya ga kibahan sami nqo pelqowi na 歐洲,25％ nqo soliq hya ga kmal maha sami ga sqoliq na 麥士蒂索 ma(kinbahan nqo sqoliq na pelqowi歐洲ki sqoliq na印第安 mbbiq laqi kneril lga yasa qo immaw qo ramo naha la) ,thay nya lga kinbahan nqo sqoliq ka mqalox非洲,sqoliq na 印第安ro binah na minrok la .sqoliq ka pelqowi nqo Chile spyang kahol sqo kinbahan kinhang an西班牙(pyang sqoliq na西班牙,安達盧西亞ki sqoliq na巴斯克),maki ozi qo kahol sqo ka kwara kahol binah na Kokka mwah maki te智利qani,maki ozi qo kahol sqo minrok na 歐洲zik qani ga wayal mimaw ramo ki kahol sqo中東te hok sqo Chile sqoliq kinbahan na阿拉伯.Sqoliq Kinbahan nqo 非洲hya ga si kyasa cikoy,kya wayl sqo sqo 1.5% qo sqoliq na Chile.Piraiyan na kawas,Kokka nqo Chile swalan nya qo kahol sqo pelqowi ,日本,台灣,韓國sqoliq ka tnwang.skaho sqo 2011 kawas gmozywaw maqot sqo ssqoliq,sqoliq nqo Chile kyawayal sqo 8％ kmayal maha sami hya ga ''tayal sqani ma. 70%na ssqoliq ga snhi sqo Teskyo,15% ssqoliq ga snihi sqo 新教,3.3% ssqoliq ga snihi sqo摩門教,1% ssqoliq ga snihi sqo耶和華見證人,8.3% ssqoliq ga ini snihi. Chileqani ga baq kmal ke na西班牙(ana ga ke na 西班牙maki sqani ga yal nqo qotox na mnanak blaq la,yal nqo "Chile"lga lpgon naha lgayal qani la ('ʃiːle)).Ke nqo馬普切,ke na maki sqo mkora kilox玻利維亞克丘亞,ke na艾馬拉,ke na 拉帕努伊hya ga ke na ''tayal sqani.maki sqo rhyal na mkora kilox Chile qinsogan naha,maki ozi qo kmal ke na德語. pinsrngyan外交 pinglgan na Chile ki 馬來西亞ga kahol sqo ggwhan nqo pinbziran.maki sqo 2009 kawas,pila ka pintbziran na Chile ki馬來西亞kya wayal sqo 3.36 ok pila na Amirika,taqo 馬來西亞pnosa nya pila sqo Chile ga wayal sqo 1680mang pila nqo Amirika,pila ka mwah myot hya ga wayal sqo1.487ok pila na Amirika. gaga文化 gaga nqo Chile ga sqonon naha ki tnwang sqo cinpoqing nqo歐洲,msqon gaga sqoliq na印第安,pchop sqo innaras na北美,nano yasa qo gaga na Chile ongat spngan kinblaq gaga nya maki sqo babaw cibwanan qani,kroma ga obih yal mtnnnaq ktan. spzyang qalang na Kokka' spzyang naha' kraho' qalang hya' ga Santiago. snyan kinramat inlongan na Kokka' snyan kinramat inlongan na Kokka' hya' ga 18 na tay mqiro' byacing na qotox kawas. mrhow Kokka' mrhow Kokka' ta' misow hya' ga Michelle Bachelet, aring ryax 11 sqo byacing tay 3 sa kawas 2014 lga, mosa' spazyang balay ms'rox kya la. cinkholan sa knita' sa brbiro' CIA 外交部
